name: Parasol Henbē
description: Parasol Henbee (パラソルヘンべえ, Parasoru Henbee) is a Japanese anime series produced and directed by Fujiko Fujio (A) (The pen name for Motoo Abiko) in 1989 which ran for 200 episodes and was translated into many languages - Chinese, Hebrew and Spanish among them. Abiko also adapted the series into a manga.
